replies.message:
Facebook I need your help. I keep sending help request but no answer. I keep getting added to groups that I HAVE NOT consented to. There needs to be a security measure in place to where the FB user has to approve being added to a group. The issue is, a lot of these groups are public. NOT WHAT I WANT even if they were closed. Please change your settings. It would be terrible if we were added to a group about disgust of our President while my Wife serves this country & I am a Veteran. Not saying this would happen, but we do have folks on our page that could think up these things. So PLEASE change these settings IMMEDIATELY!!!

In addition, We love our President.❤️
